frontMatter.title: 6.S081: Operating System Engineering
frontMatter.summary: 发现 MIT 的许多课程的资料都是公开的，都可以自己直接跟着学，只是没有上课的视频。比如这讲 OS 的 https://pdos.csail.mit.edu/6.828/2019/schedule.html 使用 xv6 OS，会让学生 Learning by doning

next.title: Making Your Code Faster by Taming Branches
next.summary: Most software code contains conditional branches. In code, they appear in if-then-else clauses, loops, and switch-case constructs.  For better performance, modern processors predict the branch and execute the following instructions speculatively. It is a powerful optimization.
